name: ensue
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to happen after something else, especially as a result of it: The police officer said that he had placed the man under arrest and that a scuffle had ensued. Synonyms
follow (HAPPEN)
result

to happen after something else, esp. as a result of it: Chaos ensued when 60 charter schools run by one company were all suddenly closed. After his outburst, a long silence ensued.
